Class.name: Strix.Testing.TestCase
Class.Description: Superclass for tests to be run by Strix.Test.Runner.

Method.name: Setup
Method.Description: Code to run before any test in this class is executed.

Method.name: TearDown
Method.Description: Code to run after all tests in this class have been executed.

Method.name: AssertTrue
AssertFalse
AssertEqual
AssertNotEqual
AssertContains
Method.Description: Asserts that string InValue contains string Expected.

Method.name: AssertListEqual
AssertListNotEqual
AssertStatusOk
AssertStatusEqual
Method.Implementation:
If Status1 = Status2 { $$$ToTerm(".") If $IsObject(..Runner) Do ..Runner.RecordAssertionOk() Quit 1 }
$$$ToTerm("E") If '$IsObject(..Runner) Quit 0
Set Text1 = $System.Status.GetErrorText(Status1) Set Text2 = $System.Status.GetErrorText(Status2) Do ..Runner.RecordAssertionFailed($$$CurrentMethod, Text1, Text2, Description)
Quit 0

Method.name: AssertErrorStatus
